Package com.batyuta.challenge.lottoland.web

Class RestAbstractController<T extends BaseEntity<T>,V extends BaseVO>

java.lang.Object
com.batyuta.challenge.lottoland.web.RestAbstractController<T,V>
Type Parameters:
T - Entity Type
V - Entity VO Type
Direct Known Subclasses:
RestRoundController, RestUserController
public abstract class RestAbstractController<T extends BaseEntity<T>,V extends BaseVO> extends Object
Abstract REST Entity Controller.
